item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 1, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Americans' love affair with big cars is killing them (17 points | 9 comments)

9. Building LLMs from the Ground Up: A 3-Hour Coding Workshop (794 points | 92 comments)
10. Einstein's Other Theory of Everything (108 points | 39 comments)
11. The web's clipboard, and how it stores data of different types (91 points | 14 comments)

14. Godot on iPad, Toolbars, Importers, Embedding, Debugger (102 points | 45 comments)

20. Lady tasting tea (41 points | 13 comments)
21. The occult technology of the rollercoaster (11 points | 4 comments)

24. Build Your Own Z80 Computer: Design Guidelines and Application (1981) (70 points | 16 comments)

26. How a leading chain of psychiatric hospitals traps patients (150 points | 74 comments)
27. The EV evolution is going to take longer than we thought (5 points | discuss)
28. Did your car witness a crime? (262 points | 540 comments)
29. A brief history of barbed wire fence telephone networks (107 points | 12 comments)
30. Making an atomic trampoline [video] (131 points | 53 comments)
